00007 """ Unit tests for the ninja.py file. """
00008 
00009 import gyp.generator.ninja as ninja
00010 import unittest
00011 import StringIO
00012 import sys
00013 import TestCommon
00014 
00015 
00016 class TestPrefixesAndSuffixes(unittest.TestCase):
00017   def test_BinaryNamesWindows(self):
00018     # These cannot run on non-Windows as they require a VS installation to
00019     # correctly handle variable expansion.
00020     if sys.platform.startswith('win'):
00021       writer = ninja.NinjaWriter('foo', 'wee', '.', '.', 'build.ninja', '.',
00022           'build.ninja', 'win')
00023       spec = { 'target_name': 'wee' }
00024       self.assertTrue(writer.ComputeOutputFileName(spec, 'executable').
00025           endswith('.exe'))
00026       self.assertTrue(writer.ComputeOutputFileName(spec, 'shared_library').
00027           endswith('.dll'))
00028       self.assertTrue(writer.ComputeOutputFileName(spec, 'static_library').
00029           endswith('.lib'))
00030 
00031   def test_BinaryNamesLinux(self):
00032     writer = ninja.NinjaWriter('foo', 'wee', '.', '.', 'build.ninja', '.',
00033         'build.ninja', 'linux')
00034     spec = { 'target_name': 'wee' }
00035     self.assertTrue('.' not in writer.ComputeOutputFileName(spec,
00036                                                             'executable'))
00037     self.assertTrue(writer.ComputeOutputFileName(spec, 'shared_library').
00038         startswith('lib'))
00039     self.assertTrue(writer.ComputeOutputFileName(spec, 'static_library').
00040         startswith('lib'))
00041     self.assertTrue(writer.ComputeOutputFileName(spec, 'shared_library').
00042         endswith('.so'))
00043     self.assertTrue(writer.ComputeOutputFileName(spec, 'static_library').
00044         endswith('.a'))
00045 
00046 if __name__ == '__main__':
00047   unittest.main()
